text: Toshiko Abe (阿部 俊子, Abe Toshiko; born 19 May 1959) is a Japanese politician who has been the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology since 2024. She is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. She has been a member of the House of Representatives in the Diet since 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website in Japanese. title: Toshiko Abe
